item.title: My First Post
item.author: Viet Nguyen
item.description: This is an example headline Text can be put into the headline. You can create another headline at the same level with another * character Another headline Nesting headlines is as easy as adding another start Nested headline Another nested headline Deeper Another headline Deeper… Deeper….. Basic markup You can really go as deep as you want. This is the general building block for org-mode navigation. Next, let's talk about some markup
